metadata.title: CVE-2017-10384 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: DDL). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.57 and earlier5.6.37 and earlier 5.7.19 and earlier. Easily exploitable vulnerabilityallows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocolsto compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mariadb-client - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-connect-engine-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-oqgraph-engine-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-10.0 - 1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.20-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
